analyzed: vassikatthera gāthā  ekaḥ api saddhaḥ medhāvī

translated: I was the only one among my faithless relatives
To be firm in Dhamma and perfect in virtue,
Out of compassion I advised my relatives,
And my kinsmen were exhorted by me.
Out of love for my kinsmen and relatives,
They made an offering to the monks.
They have passed away and died,
And have attained the bliss of heaven.
